SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , FN_GET_CODE_NAME('1', MEMBER_GENDER) MEMBER_GENDER , REGEXP_REPLACE(MEMBER_PHONENUM, '(.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\1-\2-\3') MEMBER_PHONENUM , TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERT_DATE FROM MEMBER
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%'
AND MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND MEMBER_GENDER = #{gender}
ORDER BY MEMBER_NO ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MEMBER

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.MEMBER_PHONENUM , A.MEMBER_AUTOR , A.MEMBER_BRITHDAY , A.MEMBER_LOCATION , A.MEMBER_LOCATION_DTL , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_PW_QUESTION , A.MEMBER_PW_ANSWER , B.FILE_PATH FROM MEMBER A , ( SELECT FILE_NO , FILE_PATH || '/'|| SAVE_FILE_NAME || FILE_EXTEN AS FILE_PATH FROM FILE_REPOSITROY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ) B WHERE A.MEMBER_IMAGE_NO = B.FILE_NO (+) AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
